pr_title: [FLINK-19811][table-planner] Introduce RexSimplify to simplify SEARCH conditions

timeline.author: tsreaper

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/flink-table/flink-table-planner-blink/src/main/java/org/apache/calcite/rex/RexSimplify.java b/flink-table/flink-table-planner-blink/src/main/java/org/apache/calcite/rex/RexSimplify.java index 3f413c9a09..525f8cfa38 100644 --- a/flink-table/flink-table-planner-blink/src/main/java/org/apache/calcite/rex/RexSimplify.java +++ b/flink-table/flink-table-planner-blink/src/main/java/org/apache/calcite/rex/RexSimplify.java @@ -70,7 +70,7 @@ import static org.apache.calcite.rex.RexUnknownAs.UNKNOWN; * *

Copied to fix CALCITE-4364, should be removed for the next Calcite upgrade. * - *

Changes: Line 1307, Line 1764, Line 2683 ~ Line 2656. + *

Changes: Line 1307, Line 1764, Line 2638 ~ Line 2656. */ public class RexSimplify { private final boolean paranoid;

timeline.message:
[FLINK-19811][table-planner] Introduce RexSimplify to simplify SEARCH conditions

e.g. [CALCITE-4364] `a IN (1, 2) AND a = 1` should be simplified to `a = 1`
